title: FeedEvent model with indexes
description: Implement `app/models/feed_event.py` with FeedEvent model. Columns: id (String(26) PK ULID for time-ordering), event_type (Enum(EventType)), actor_id (FK to users.id CASCADE), target_type (String(20)), target_id (String(26)), metadata (JSONB default {}), created_at (DateTime tz). Indexes: (created_at) descending, (event_type, created_at), (actor_id). Relationship: actor (User).
acceptance_criteria:
- FeedEvent model with all columns
- actor_id FK with cascade
- Three indexes defined: created_at DESC, (event_type, created_at), (actor_id)
- metadata JSONB with default {}
- Relationship to User as actor
